name: Baked Crab Cakes with Roasted Red Pepper Remoulade
author: Sarah D
summary: Unbelievably moist and so easy! These have been requested several times and they are always gone in an instant!
ingredients: 6  buttery round crackers (such as Ritz®), crushed, or more as needed
1 tablespoon butter, softened, or more to taste
1 ½ teaspoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
⅓ cup diced roasted red peppers
directions: Preheat oven to 360 degrees F (182 degrees C)
Gently mix cracker crumbs, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, egg, butter, parsley, seafood seasoning, mustard powder, black pepper, and Worcestershire sauce together in a bowl; fold in crabmeat
Form crabmeat mixture into patties, about 2 tablespoons per patty
Arrange patties on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until crab cakes are golden brown, about 30 minutes
Blend 1/2 cup mayonnaise, roasted red peppers, and cayenne pepper together in a food processor or blender until smooth and creamy
